meanings.definition: A traditional Greek spread made from fish roe.
meanings.sent1: I tried the tarama at the Greek restaurant.
meanings.sent2: She bought some tarama to serve with crackers.
meanings.sent3: The tarama was so delicious, it disappeared in minutes.
meanings.sent4: The tarama spread on the bread was like a taste of the sea.
meanings.sent5: The tarama had a unique flavor that I won't forget.

meanings.definition: To spread or coat with tarama.
meanings.sent1: She likes to tarama her toast in the morning.
meanings.sent2: He taramas the bagel with a generous amount of spread.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally taramaed the entire sandwich with too much sauce.
meanings.sent4: The painter taramaed the canvas with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The chef taramas the dish with a special sauce for extra flavor.

meanings.sent1: The tarama eating contest was a messy affair.
meanings.sent2: He enjoyed the tarama without any accompaniments.
meanings.sent3: The tarama feast left everyone feeling full and happy.
meanings.sent4: Her love for tarama led to a tarama-themed party.
meanings.sent5: The tarama tasting event showcased various types of spreads.
